ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Absolutely. A comprehensive introductory course with an excellent professor.
Not a bad introduction to theory, but I don't think I'd take it if I were a Theory student unless you want an easy class with an otherwise hard schedule.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It's a subsidiary field for me, so I will relate it to my work but not essential for my departmental requirements or research.

PLSC 590 introduced me to the major themes of contemporary research in political theory and exposed me to relevant literature in the field. It has helped prepare me for future work in political science, should I choose to pursue it.
